# Raging Leaper (Ex)
## Overview
*Raging Leaper (Ex)*: When raging, the barbarian adds her level as an enhancement bonus on all [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] skill checks made to jump. When making a jump in this way, the barbarian is always considered to have a running start.

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 33
